item.description:
It's an appetizer cooking class!

On the menu:

Mini Crab Cakes

Brie Bites

Stuffed Mushrooms

Chicken Satay

The Best Shrimp You'll Ever Eat

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Dip

Specialty Drink: Cran-Daddy Cooler (this will be a non-alcoholic drink, but with easy substitutions, it's a killer cocktail!)

Class Details:

*All of the food will be purchased ahead of time by the Event Organizers.  Cost will be approximately $15-$20 per person (excluding Debbi) plus any applicable Event Fees.  Please bring cash.  (When making different appetizers, there are a lot more ingredients, so the cost is a little more than usual.)

*Please let us know in your RSVP Comments if you have a Food Allergy.  We will make sure we exclude that from whatever we cook.

*After we prepare and cook we will dine and sample our creations.

*We will provide a copy of all recipes for everyone to take home with them.

*Please bring 1-2 (one to two) 1-serving (one serving) containers.  We will do our best to send everyone home with at least one serving.  Please Note: There may be leftovers for some items but not others.

Join us for a few hours of fun, food, friends and learning to cook and enjoy some new foods!

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

September Cooking Class & Meal

Saturday, Sept. 15th, 4:30pm-9pm (approximate end time +/- 1/2 hr)

Debbi's Home

Quincy, MA

Phone #: To be emailed with directions to Yes RSVPs at or shortly after the RSVP Deadline.

 

Meeting Place: Inside Debbi's apartment.

Organizer: Debbi

Cost: Between $15-$20, TBD @ Event based on cost of Food & # of Attendees (minus Debbi)

Event Fee: [Current 2012] Annual Members - FREE, Members - $2 each; $6 to become a 2012 Annual Member

Min/Max: Minimum of 4 by Friday, Sept. 14.  Maximum of 8.  These numbers include the Event Organizers

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Friday, Sep. 14th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  In addition, we will be buying the food based on the # of Yes RSVPs.  Absolutely no RSVP changes will be allowed after 10am on Saturday.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather: This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information around the RSVP Deadline.  Please check back here for further information.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Will be emailed to Yes RSVPs shortly after the RSVP deadline.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Cooking Classes Return!
